basics.label: Engineering Manager
basics.summary: Dedicated Engineering Manager with excellent technical, analytical and communication skills demonstrated by years of experience. Results-driven Mechanical Engineer with solid product engineering and QA experience.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Managed the manufacturing and engineering team. Supported the manufacturing startup in the US, by mentoring and training of production personnel. Supported the sales team during the project quotation process, by providing technical solutions to client request, lead times and cost estimates for requests. Supervised the creation of fixture submission packages for client approval. Designed fixtures for manufacturing.
highlights: Managed the manufacturing and engineering team
Supported the sales team during the project quotation process
Supervised the creation of fixture submission packages for client approval

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Collaborated with Architect and Lighting Designer in providing cost effective and environmentally friendly Lighting Solutions for unique Architectural Condition.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Analyzed specifications from customer for initial elevator fixture design that will conform to all relevant ASME and Fire Safety Codes. Revised drawings based on customer corrections and updated information from field surveys.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Analyzed specifications received from customers for order processing. Designed lighting fixtures that can be easily manufactured at the lowest possible cost based on the interpretation of the given specifications using CAD software.
